showScoreExcerpt:
There is symbolic significance to Kennedy, perhaps the oldest living playwright in America and among the most respected, finally making her Broadway debut, all the more so because of [James Earl Jones, Kenny Leon], Audra McDonald, the most honored living Broadway actress
…There is some irony, then, that I actually liked this version of “Ohio State Murders” somewhat less than a production of the same eerie, riveting, challenging play that I saw early last year
